parameters.query: =SELECT id, custom_attributes FROM contacts WHERE account_id = '{{ $json.extra.account }}' AND identifier = '{{ $json.chat.id }}'

=SELECT 
 display_id, 
 status
FROM conversations 
WHERE 
	account_id = '{{ $json.account }}' 
	AND inbox_id = '{{ $json.inbox }}'
	AND contact_id = '{{ $json.contactid }}'
ORDER BY id DESC
LIMIT 1
=SELECT id, custom_attributes FROM contacts WHERE account_id = '{{ $json.extra.account }}' AND phone_number = '{{ $json.chat.phone }}'
